drinks.name: Level headed Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into snifter.

drinks.name: Dream Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Whisky Mac
drinks.description: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

drinks.name: Apple Karate
drinks.description: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: The 21st Century
drinks.description: Swirl absinthe in chilled cocktail glass to coat inside; discard excess absinthe. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Kretchma Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Clamato Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice, strain, and serve over ice cubes in old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Bora Bora
drinks.description: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

drinks.name: Waterloo
drinks.description: Pour rum and orange juice over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir. Float Mandarine Napoleon on top.

drinks.name: Golden Slipper
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Float an unbroken egg yolk on top

drinks.name: Baby Guinness
drinks.description: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

drinks.name: Gables Collins
drinks.description: Shake first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with soda water. Garnish with lemon and pineapple.

drinks.name: Vodka Grasshopper Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: White Spider
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Oreo Mudslide
drinks.description: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Bloody Bull
drinks.description: Pour into ice-filled highball glass. Stir. Squeeze and add lemon. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Western Rose Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Favourite Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Parisian Blonde Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Guadalajara
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Favorite Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Georgia Peach
drinks.description: Stir first three ingredients in Collins glass. Add ice and stir again. Fill with lemonade.

drinks.name: Stinger
drinks.description: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Trinity Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Purple Twister
drinks.description: Pour into collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with cola, add slice of lemon, and stir.
Shake well with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: White Cargo Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake until thoroughly mixed and add water or sauterne if the mixture if too thick. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: White Elephant
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Manhattan Cocktail (dry)
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with an olive.

drinks.name: Alice Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Amante Picante
drinks.description: Muddle 2 cucumber slices and cilantro in mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice and double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cucumber.

drinks.name: Bellini Martini
drinks.description:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

drinks.name: Dry Martini
drinks.description: serve with an olive.

drinks.name: Mariposa Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cherry Sling
drinks.description: Serve in old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Homemade Kahlua
drinks.description: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

drinks.name: Pink Squirrel Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Jam Donut
drinks.description: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

drinks.name: Cafe Savoy
drinks.description: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

drinks.name: Casa Blanca
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Pink Paradise
drinks.description: Stir ingredients in ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Asshole
drinks.description: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

drinks.name: Margarita Tequila
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lime and salt. Shake remaining ingredients and ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: God Child
drinks.description: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain and serve in a champagne glass.

drinks.name: The Wink
drinks.description: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with absinthe and pour out excess absinthe. Stir remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass. Garnish with a wink.

drinks.name: Caledonia
drinks.description: Shake well with ice and Strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle cinnamon on top.

drinks.name: Moranguito
drinks.description: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

drinks.name: Shanghai Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Spiced Peach Punch
drinks.description: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

drinks.name: Lassi Raita
drinks.description: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

drinks.name: Sea breeze
drinks.description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: L'italienne
drinks.description: Stir and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cherry Wine Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gin and Milk Punch
drinks.description: Shake with ice, strain into collins glass, and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Mountain Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Coffee Sour
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass.

drinks.name: Addington
drinks.description: Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass. Top up with a squirt of Soda Water.

drinks.name: Canal Street Daisy
drinks.description: Add Scotch and juices to ice-filled Collins glass and stir. Fill with soda water and stir again. Garnish with orange.

drinks.name: Abbey Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Canadian Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Shady Lady
drinks.description: Combine all ingredients in ice-filled highball glass and stir. Garnish with lime and melon or cherry.

drinks.name: Cherry Blossom
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with brandy and sugar. Shake ingredients with ice and strain into glass. Add cherry.

drinks.name: Dillatini Cocktail
drinks.description: Serve with a dilly bean.

drinks.name: Devil's Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bermuda Rose
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Adam Bomb
drinks.description: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

drinks.name: Robson Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Vodka Gimlet
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sherry-and-Egg Cocktail
drinks.description: Place an egg in a cocktail glass, being careful not to break the yolk. Add 2 oz. cream sherry.

drinks.name: Chas
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Minnehaha Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 4 oz. cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Dixie Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black & Tan
drinks.description: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

drinks.name: The Refuge
drinks.description: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Montezuma
drinks.description: Mix in blender at low speed and serve in champagne flute.

drinks.name: Resolute Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bucks Fizz (Mimosa)
drinks.description: Pour 2 oz. orange juice in a collins glass over two cubes of ice, fill with Chilled Champagne, and stir very gently.

drinks.name: Thai Iced Tea
drinks.description: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

drinks.name: Mudslinger
drinks.description: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

drinks.name: White Russian
drinks.description: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

drinks.name: Champagne Flamingo
drinks.description: Shake vodka and Campari with ice. Strain into chilled champagne flute and top with Champagne. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Midnight Manx
drinks.description: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Little Princess Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sidecar
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Boston Bullet
drinks.description: A Martini substituting an olive stuffed with an almond for the regular olive. See Martini on page 130.

drinks.name: The Duboudreau Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Paloma
drinks.description: Pour tequila into ice-filled Collins glass. Fill glass with soda and stir briefly. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Strawberry Sunries
drinks.description: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with orange juice. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

drinks.name: Lights On The Plaza
drinks.description: Muddle cucumbers, lemon juice, and syrup in mixing glass. Add vodka, raspberry liqueur, and ice and shake. Double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with raspberry-cucumber skewer.

drinks.name: Absinthe Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Derby Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: B-53
drinks.description: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

drinks.name: Paddington
drinks.description: Pour absinthe into chilled cocktail glass, swirl to coat inside, and discard excess. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass. Add grapefruit twist.

drinks.name: Orange Gin Rickey
drinks.description: Pour into highball glass over ice cubes and fill with carbonated water. Add wedge of lime. Stir.

drinks.name: Jack-in-the-Box Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Caf_ di Amaretto
drinks.description: Add 1 oz. Amaretto to a cup of black coffee. Top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Pink Pussycat
drinks.description: Pour ingredients into ice-filled highball glass and stir.

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

drinks.name: Mexican Firing Squad
drinks.description: Shake and strain into ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Purple Pancho
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail or margarita glass with lime wedge and sugar. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and pour with ice into glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Mr. 404
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Japanese
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Green Hornet (Dry)
drinks.description: Pour lime vodka over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and add a half-slice of lime.

drinks.name: Caipirissima
drinks.description: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

drinks.name: I.A.P.
drinks.description: Build in ice-filled Collins glass.

drinks.name: A. J.
drinks.description: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Trois Rivieres
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add a twist of orange peel.

drinks.name: Bum's Rush
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Twister
drinks.description: Pour vodka and lime juice into Collins glass. Add several ice cubes. Squeeze lime into glass and add. Fill with lemon-lime soda and stir.

drinks.name: Baltimore Bracer Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The Joe Lewis
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sunday Confession
drinks.description: Pour the first three ingredients into Collins glass and stir briefly. Add ice and top with ginger beer. Add lemon.

drinks.name: Siberian Sleighride
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled snifter. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: Orchid Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Toasted Drop
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lemon and cinnamon sugar. Shake ingredients without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: White Lady Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gentleman's Club
drinks.description: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinks.name: Cranberry Punch
drinks.description: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

drinks.name: Top Banana
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Spanish chocolate
drinks.description: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

drinks.name: New York Lemonade
drinks.description: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

drinks.name: Autodafé
drinks.description: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

drinks.name: Snowball Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Chef's Pain
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: After Five
drinks.description: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

drinks.name: Brandy Alexander
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Martini
drinks.description: Stir rum and vermouth with ice in mixing glass. Strain into ice-filled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Look Out Below
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Grape Vodka Froth
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Godfather
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: French Connection
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Harrington
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange zest.

drinks.name: Happy Skipper
drinks.description: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

drinks.name: Fantasio Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: A Day at the Beach
drinks.description: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

drinks.name: Cool Carlos
drinks.description: Mix all ingredients except curacao with ice, shake well. Pour into collins glass and float curacao on top. Garnish with pineapple and orange slices, and a cherry.

drinks.name: Loch Lomond
drinks.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Mint Julep (Southern Style)
drinks.description: In silver mug or collins glass, dissolve powdered sugar with water. Fill with finely shaved ice and add bourbon. Stir until glass is heavily frosted, adding more ice if necessary. (Do not hold glass with hand while stirring.) Decorate with sprigs of fresh mint so that the tops are about two inches above the rim of glass. Use short straws so that it will be necessary to bury nose in mint, which is intended for scent rather than taste.

drinks.name: Ice Cream Flip
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Sprinkle a little nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Arizona Twister
drinks.description: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

drinks.name: Greenback
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Artillery Punch
drinks.description: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Alaska Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Eye-Opener
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass.

drinks.name: Kurant Tea
drinks.description: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Shot-gun
drinks.description: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

drinks.name: Tanq-A-Rita
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Queen Elizabeth
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bella Fragolia
drinks.description: Muddle chopped strawberry and 4 basil leaves in mixing glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, and syrup with ice and shake well. Double-strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass and top with soda water. Garnish with strawberry and basil.

drinks.name: Frisky Witch
drinks.description: Stir in old-fashioned glass. Add ice and stir again. Garnish with licorice.

drinks.name: Gentle Ben
drinks.description: Shake first three ingredients with ice and pour into ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with orange and cherry.

drinks.name: Boston Sour
drinks.description: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Kool First Aid
drinks.description: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

drinks.name: Monte Carlo Imperial Highball
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over ice cubes. Fill glass with champagne and stir.

drinks.name: Cherry Flip
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Sprinkle a little nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Gin Toddy
drinks.description: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

drinks.name: Dillatini
drinks.description: A Martini substituting a dilly bean in place of the olive. See Martini on page 130.

drinks.name: Strawberry Margarita
drinks.description: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Saronno Colada (Nutty Colada)
drinks.description: Put in an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice and blend at high speed for a short time. Pour into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Orange Whip
drinks.description: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Frozen Apple
drinks.description: Combine ingredients with a cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at low speed. Pour into old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Cuba Libra
drinks.description: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
drinks.description: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinks.name: Bumble Bee #1
drinks.description: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Prairie Oyster
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over two ice cubes.  Place an egg yolk on top without breaking it. Add a dash of cayenne pepper.

drinks.name: Devil's Soul
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Flame orange twist and add to glass.

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
drinks.description: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

drinks.name: Napoleon Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Zizi Coin-coin
drinks.description: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

drinks.name: Robin's Nest
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
drinks.description: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

drinks.name: Screwdriver
drinks.description: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: New Orleans Gin Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass with two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Mamie's Sister
drinks.description: Put the juice of one lime and a lime twist into collins glass, and add gin. Fill glass with ginger ale and ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Hennessy Martini
drinks.description: Fill shaker or mixing glass with ice. Add Hennessy and lemon juice. Stir gently, don't shake. Let settle. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Tropical Heart
drinks.description: Pour ingredients into Irish coffee cup and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: La Perla
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Foxy Lady
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bull And Bear
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry and orange.

drinks.name: Cherry Rum
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Plain Vermouth Cocktail
drinks.description: See Vermouth Cocktail on page 189.

drinks.name: Milk Punch
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: High Plains Drifter No. 1
drinks.description: Swirl Campari in chilled cocktail glass to coat inside; discard excess Campari. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Froth Blower Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Betsy Ross Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with cracked ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Vodka Daisy
drinks.description: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled beer mug or metal cup. Garnish with fruit.

drinks.name: Priority Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Tiger Tanaka
drinks.description: Muddle cilantro and ginger in mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients and shake. Double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Suissesse Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Long vodka
drinks.description: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

drinks.name: Cuban Special Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Decorate with stick of pineapple and a cherry.

drinks.name: Prince's Smile Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Mocha Express
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Smile Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sweet Tooth
drinks.description: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

drinks.name: Will Rogers
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gin Cooler

drinks.name: Coffee-Vodka
drinks.description: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

drinks.name: Tabby Cat

drinks.name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
drinks.description: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Egg Nog #4
drinks.description: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

drinks.description: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

drinks.name: May Blossom Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Bourbon and Water
drinks.description: Pour bourbon and water into old-fashioned glass. Add ice and a twist of lemon peel, if desired, and stir.

drinks.name: Rum Coooler
drinks.description: In collins glass, dissolve powdered sugar in carbonated water. Stir. Fill glass with ice and add rum. Fill with carbonated water or ginger ale and stir again. Insert a spiral of orange or lemon peel (or both) and dangle end over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Tchoupitolas Street Guzzle
drinks.description: Pour rum into highball glass over ice cubes. Add ginger beer.

drinks.name: H. P. W. Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange peel.

drinks.name: Silver Stallion Fizz
drinks.description: Shake gin and ice cream with ice and strain into highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Royal Purple Punch
drinks.description: Pour two bottles (750-ml size) claret or red wine and two large bottles ginger ale over ice cubes in punch bowl. Stir well. Float thin slices of lemon studded with cloves on top. Serve in punch glasses.

drinks.name: De La Louisiane
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: Lillypad
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with blood orange wheel.

drinks.name: Poppy Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Coffee Flip
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Sprinkle a little nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Doctor Cook
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into wine glass.

drinks.name: Lunch Box
drinks.description: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

drinks.name: Brandy Squirt
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass and fill with club soda. Decorate with stick of pineapple and strawberries.

drinks.name: Orange Gin Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass with two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Tequila Matador
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled champagne flute.

drinks.name: Algonquin
drinks.description: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Adios Amigos Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinks.name: Cape Codder
drinks.description: Pour into ice-filled highball glass. Stir well. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: General Harrison's Eggnog
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with red wine and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Affair
drinks.description: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: Miami Vice
drinks.description: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

drinks.name: Limestone
drinks.description: Into ice-filled highball glass, pour bourbon, fill glass with collins mix, and add lime juice to taste.

drinks.name: Lemouroudji
drinks.description: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Gypsy Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Alamo Splash
drinks.description: Pour first three ingredients into ice-filled Collins glass. Top with lemon-lime soda and stir.

drinks.name: Gilchrist
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Chapala
drinks.description: Shake and strain into hurricane glass. Fill glass with crushed ice. Garnish with orange blossoms, if using, and orange wedge.

drinks.name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Decorate with a slice of pineapple.

drinks.name: Pearl Button
drinks.description: Shake first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Top with soda. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

drinks.name: Russian Bear Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinks.description: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Avalanche
drinks.description: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

drinks.name: London Special Cocktail
drinks.description: Put a large twist of orange peel into champagne glass. Add 1 lump sugar and 2 dashes bitters. Fill with well-chilled champagne and stir.

drinks.name: French Quarter
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon.

drinks.name: Rum Relaxer
drinks.description: Shake first three ingredients with ice and pour with ice into hurricane or parfait glass. Fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with orange and cherry.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Sunburn
drinks.description: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with club soda. Add a dash of grenadine for color.

drinks.name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Mai-Tai (Trader Vic Version)
drinks.description: Shake ingredients without ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with lime shell, mint, and skewered pineapple and cherry.

drinks.name: Depth Bomb
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Dirty Nipple
drinks.description: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

drinks.name: Veteran
drinks.description: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Goldrush
drinks.description: Shake and strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: X. Y. Z. Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Weep-No-More Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Shamrock Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with an olive.

drinks.name: Combo
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Roselyn Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Cole's Raspberry Cream
drinks.description: Shake or blend.

drinks.name: Blind Russian
drinks.description: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

drinks.name: Cameron's Kick Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ringo Starr
drinks.description: Muddle grapes, lemon, mint, and sugar in shaker. Add rum and ice and shake briefly. Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Mariposa
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
drinks.description: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

drinks.name: Grandfather
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: Valencia Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Melya
drinks.description: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

drinks.name: Bellini
drinks.description: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Cubeltini
drinks.description: Muddle the cucumber, mint leaves, and syrup. Add vodka and lime juice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with mint sprig.

drinks.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

drinks.name: Special Rough Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Avalon
drinks.description: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

drinks.name: Cactus Berry
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lime and salt. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Manila Fizz
drinks.description: Lemon Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over two ice cubes.

drinks.name: Harvest Moon
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Mexicola
drinks.description: Pour tequila and lime juice into ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with cola and stir.

drinks.name: Basil 8
drinks.description: Muddle basil and 5 grapes in Collins glass. Add next four ingredients and stir. Add ice and top with ginger ale. Garnish with basil sprig and 1 white grape.

drinks.name: 19th Century
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Frappé
drinks.description: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

drinks.name: Arctic Mouthwash
drinks.description: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Virgin
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
drinks.description: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

drinks.name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

drinks.name: Monkey Gland
drinks.description: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cider Eggnog
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Then fill the glass with cider and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Tom Collins
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Turf Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Pickled Pink
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with dill.

drinks.name: Passion Mimosa
drinks.description: Pour chilled juice into champagne flute, fill with chilled champagne. Garnish with strawberry.

drinks.name: La Vita Dulce
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Top with cinnamon.

drinks.name: Moulin Rouge Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
drinks.description: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

drinks.name: Apello
drinks.description: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Canadian Cherry
drinks.description: Moisten rim of old-fashioned glass with maraschino liqueur. Fill with ice. Shake ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Boston Sidecar
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin and It
drinks.description: Stir ingredients in cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink.)

drinks.name: Jack Maples
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: Vampiro
drinks.description: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

drinks.name: Frozen Brandy and Rum
drinks.description: Combine ingredients with a cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at low speed. Pour into old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Rebel Charge
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add orange slice.

drinks.name: Brighton Punch
drinks.description: Shake first five ingredients with ice and pour with ice into Collins glass. Fill with soda water and stir gently. Garnish with orange and lemon and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Rio Fix
drinks.description: Pour pastis into chilled champagne flute and swirl to coat inside. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Bourbon Sour
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Boozy Snickers Milkshake
drinks.description: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

drinks.name: Irish Shillelagh
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled Irish coffee glass. Garnish with berries, peach slices, and cherry.

drinks.name: Kool-Aid Slammer
drinks.description: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

drinks.name: Jade
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: No. 8
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

drinks.name: Cara Sposa
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Champs Elysees Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Martinique Rose
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sidewinder
drinks.description: Fill Collins glass 1/2 full with crushed ice. Add all ingredients. Swizzle with barspoon until glass is frosted. Fill to brim with additional ice. Garnish with mint.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: High Cotton
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon and mint.

drinks.name: Bloody Scotsman
drinks.description: Mix ingredients together, stirring often, in a large container, adding salt to taste. Chill for at least 24 hours before serving. Serve in icefilled old-fashioned glasses.

drinks.name: Handball Cooler
drinks.description: Pour vodka into ice-filled highball glass. Fill almost to top with soda water. Top with orange juice and stir. Add lime.

drinks.name: Zimadori Zinger
drinks.description: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Moonquake Shake
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black Cherry Chocolate
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Leap Frog Highball
drinks.description: Pour into highball glass over ice cubes and fill with ginger ale. Stir.

drinks.name: Georgia Mule
drinks.description: Muddle 1 peach slice in Collins glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, and bitters, then stir. Fill with ice and ginger beer; stir again. Garnish with peach slice.

drinks.name: Arizona Antifreeze
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

drinks.name: Peggy Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Apricot Lady
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

drinks.name: Vodka Stinger
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gilroy Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Amaretto Rose
drinks.description: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: Surf Rider
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with orange and cherry.

drinks.name: The Crux
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Greenpoint
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

drinks.name: Bronx SIlver Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass.

drinks.name: City Slicker
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Planter's Punch
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinks.name: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
drinks.description: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

drinks.name: Tequila Surprise
drinks.description: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

drinks.name: Allies Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Camino Del Ray
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Absolutly Screwed Up
drinks.description: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

drinks.name: London Buck
drinks.description: Pour gin and lemon juice over ice cubes in highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and stir.

drinks.name: Hai Karate
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with cherry/orange flag.

drinks.name: Sake Martini (Sakini)

drinks.name: Mocha-Berry
drinks.description: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Chocolate Black Russian
drinks.description: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Boston Sidecar Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Toreador
drinks.description: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cocoa. THE 21ST CENTURY 1 splash

drinks.name: Nutty Irishman
drinks.description: Serve over ice

drinks.name: Alabama Slammer
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

drinks.name: Heavenly Dram
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Allegheny
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Mulled Wine
drinks.description: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

drinks.name: Chocolate Flip
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Sprinkle a little nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinks.name: Black Hawk
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: Just a Moonmint
drinks.description: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Van Vleet
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Pollyanna Cocktai
drinks.description: Muddle ingredients. Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Red Swizzle
drinks.description: Make the same as Gin Swizzle (see page 99) and add one tablespoon of grenadine. If desired, rum, brandy, or whiskey may be substituted for the gin.

drinks.name: Velvet Peach Hammer
drinks.description: Pour vodka and schnapps into ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and top with syrup and lemon juice. Garnish with peach.

drinks.name: Pink Lady Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Vagabundo
drinks.description: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: T.N.T. Cocktail No. 2
drinks.description: Mix with ice in an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Melon Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with a cherry.

drinks.name: Brown Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Phoebe Snow Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hairy Sunrise
drinks.description: Shake first four ingredients with ice. Strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Float grenadine on top. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
drinks.description: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Opening Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Opera Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Screaming Orgasm
drinks.description: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

drinks.name: Brantini
drinks.description: Stir with cracked ice and strain into old-fashioned glass with cubed ice. Add a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Jamaica Hop
drinks.description: Shake well with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Big Red Hooter
drinks.description: Pour tequila and amaretto into ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Add cherry. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Amaretto And Cream
drinks.description: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: London Town
drinks.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Berry Deadly
drinks.description: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: A Furlong Too Late
drinks.description: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Waiting On Summer
drinks.description: Muddle cucumber, sage, and lime juice in mixing glass. Add tequila and syrup with ice and shake. Double-strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with strawberry.

drinks.name: Orange Gin Collins
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several cubes of ice, fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of lemon and orange and a cherry. Serve with straws.

drinks.name: Viva Villa
drinks.description: Rim old-fashioned glass with lime and salt. Fill with ice. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Floridita No. 3
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Bramble
drinks.description: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

drinks.name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 1
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Chocolate Daisy
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into stein or metal cup. Add ice cubes and decorate with fruit

drinks.name: A Piece of Ass
drinks.description: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

drinks.name: Big Red

drinks.name: Spritzer Highball

Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

drinks.name: Glogg

Add 1 lb. each blanched almonds and seedless raisins and continue to boil for additional 15 minutes. Remove kettle from stove and place wire grill containing 1 lb. lump sugar over opening. Pour one 750-ml Brandy over sugar, making sure to saturate all of it. Then light sugar with match and let it flame. After sugar has melted, replace kettle cover to extinguish flame. Stir again and remove spice bag. Serve hot in punch cups with a few almonds and raisins.

drinks.name: Drinking Chocolate
drinks.description: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

(Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

drinks.name: Hot Shot Margarita
drinks.description: Rub rim of cocktail glass with rind of lemon or lime, dip rim in salt. Shake ingredients with ice and strain into the salt-rimmed glass.

drinks.name: Dubliner
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Flame orange twist and add.

drinks.name: Lychee Lucy
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lycheepineapple garnish.

drinks.name: Gauguin
drinks.description: Combine ingredients with a cup of crushed ice in blender and blend at low speed. Serve in old-fashioned glass. Top with a cherry.

drinks.name: Adam and Eve
drinks.description: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Le Paradini
drinks.description: Shake first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Top with Champagne.

drinks.name: Venial Sin
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Dry Rob Roy
drinks.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Vesper
drinks.description: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Tomato Tang
drinks.description: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Vodka Fizz
drinks.description: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Abilene
drinks.description: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Peach Blow Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Amaretto Stinger
drinks.description: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Coffee Old-Fashioned
drinks.description: Pour bourbon, syrup, bitters, and coffee into ice-filled old-fashioned glass and stir. Add soda water and stir again. Garnish with orange and cherry.

drinks.name: Vodka Cooler
drinks.description: Stir vodka and syrup in Collins glass. Add ice cubes and fill with soda water or ginger ale. Insert a spiral of orange or lemon zest (or both) and dangle end(s) over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Mexican Monk
drinks.description: Stir well with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Temptation Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add twists of lemon and orange peel.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan Martini
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

drinks.name: Grim Reaper
drinks.description: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

drinks.name: Imperial Fizz
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Purple Passion Iced Tea
drinks.description: Pour ingredients into ice-filled highball glass in order listed and stir. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Herbal flame
drinks.description: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

drinks.name: Brain Fart
drinks.description: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

drinks.name: Alfie Cocktail
drinks.description: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Emperor Norton's Mistress
drinks.description: Muddle halved strawberries in mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice and double-strain into ice-filled oldfashioned glass. Garnish with strawberry slice.

drinks.name: Ruby Red
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

drinks.name: Character Development
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

drinks.name: Mandarine Sour
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Decorate with a cherry and orange slice.

drinks.name: Blood Bronx Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Irish Rickey
drinks.description: Pour whiskey and lime juice into ice-filled highball glass. Fill with soda water and stir. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Duke Cocktail
drinks.description: Add first five ingredients, shake with ice. and strain into champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and stir.

drinks.name: Butter Baby
drinks.description: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

drinks.name: Adderly Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Flame orange twist and add.

drinks.name: Afternoon
drinks.description: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

drinks.name: A1
drinks.description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Paradise
drinks.description: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

drinks.name: Grasshopper Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Carroll Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add cherry.

drinks.name: Bolero Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir well with cracked ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hush and Wonder
drinks.description: Pour creme de violette into chilled cocktail glass and swirl to coat; discard excess liqueur. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Rum Old-Fashioned
drinks.description: Stir in ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Vodka And Tonic
drinks.description: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: The Blinker
drinks.description: Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with grapefruit twist or raspberry.

drinks.name: Bulldog Highballl
drinks.description: Pour into highball glass over ice cubes and fill with ginger ale. Stir.

drinks.name: California Root Beer
drinks.description: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

drinks.name: A Splash of Nash
drinks.description: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

drinks.name: Ante
drinks.description: Stir well with cracked ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sidecar Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Snake Bite (UK)
drinks.description: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

drinks.name: Casino Royale
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Bourbon Cooler
drinks.description: Shake with ice in mixing glass. Pour with ice into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with peach.

drinks.name: Vermouth Cassis
drinks.description: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

drinks.name: K.C.B. Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: La Bomba
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lime wedge and sugar. Combine next four ingredients with ice and shake briefly. Pour with ice into glass. Add grenadine and garnish with lime wheel.

drinks.name: Martini (Dry) (5-to-1)
drinks.description: Follow directions for Martini preparation.

drinks.name: Clover Club
drinks.description: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

drinks.name: Kup's Indispensable Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Lassi Khara
drinks.description: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

drinks.name: Vow Of Silence
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ruby Tuesday
drinks.description: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

drinks.name: Outrigger
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: The Big Crush
drinks.description: Shake first four ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and top with Champagne. Garnish with berries.

drinks.name: Brooklyn
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The Interesting Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

drinks.name: Affinity
drinks.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ninotchka Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Green Dragon Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Kentucky B And B
drinks.description: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

drinks.name: Flaming Lamborghini
drinks.description: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

drinks.name: Bulla's Eye
drinks.description: Stir brandy and hard cider in highball glass. Add ice, fill with ginger ale, and stir again.

drinks.name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
drinks.description: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

drinks.name: Oh, Gosh!
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

drinks.name: Dubonnet Fizz
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.

drinks.name: Pike's Peak Cooler
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass with cracked ice. Fill with cider and stir. Insert a spiral of orange or lemon peel (or both) and dangle over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Hoffman House Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with an olive.

drinks.name: Malmaison
drinks.description: Rim chilled cocktail glass with anisette. Shake remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: September Morn Cocktail
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Brandy Flip
drinks.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Red Raider
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Flying Scotchman Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Emerald Isle Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Easter Elchies
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with brandied cherry.

drinks.name: Tequini Cocktail
drinks.description: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with twist of lemon peel and an olive.

drinks.name: Aloha Fruit punch
drinks.description: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill throroughly.

drinks.name: Akogare
drinks.description: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Orange Push-up
drinks.description: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

drinks.name: Orangeade
drinks.description: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Sonic Blaster
drinks.description: Shake and pour into ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with orange and lime.

drinks.name: Blue Canary
drinks.description: Combine ingredients with ice in mixing glass and stir gently. Strain into chilled cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.name: Lassi - Mango
drinks.description: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.
